SELECT md.num, userId, nickName, mileage, NVL(count,0) requestCount FROM memberDetail md LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT num, NVL(COUNT(*), 0) count FROM request GROUP BY num ) rc ON md.num = rc.num
ORDER BY num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY

SELECT requestNum, point, purchase, TO_CHAR(requestDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') requestDate, status, NVL(userId, '비회원') FROM request r JOIN payment p ON r.requestNum = p.requestNum LEFT OUTER JOIN memberDetail md ON md.num = r.num ORDER BY num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
